original_text: We know that someone who builds a house is more important than the house itself. In the same way, we should praise Jesus more than we praise Moses, because Jesus is greater.
korean_text: 그는 모세보다 더욱 영광을 받을 만한 것이 마치 집 지은 자가 그 집보다 더욱 존귀함 같으니라

sentences.original_text: that someone who builds a house
is more important than the house itself
we should praise Jesus more than we praise Moses
sentences.korean_translation: 우리는 모세보다 예수를 더 칭송해야 합니다
